name: Game of Chance (Jaarus)
description:
Game of Chance is a Dice Game where You have to race against Death himself, 

How Lucky are you that is for you to decide :)

Game created for GMTK 2022 - Roll of the Dice (Theme)

Note: Play the Game in Full Screen. Thank you :)

How game works - 

1. Player uses Dice to move forward.

2. If Player Dice value matches the RNG value of Opponent they skip a turn ( vice versa)
